Package de.systemagmbh.tools.message

Provides message related classes and resources.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ISysMessageConstant The class ISysMessageConstant was written for the constants used with the ISysMessages.
ISysMessageItemNames This interface defines the name of message items that are usually in a message that is sent by Systema Applications.
 

Class Summary
ASysMessage This is an abstract implementation of ISysMessage, implementing some common methods.
ASysMessageItem This is an abstract implementation of ISysMessageItem, implementing some common methods.
ASysVariableMessage Abstract implementation of the ISysVariableValue and ISysVariableValueMessage interfaces, extending ASysMessage.
ASysVariableMessageItem An abstract implementation of ISysVariableValueMessageItem, extending ASysMessageItem.
 

Package de.systemagmbh.tools.message Description

Provides message related classes and resources.
